frontmatter.title: EJS Plain Loader
frontmatter.backgroundAlt: A screenshot of EJS Plain Loader on npm

frontmatter.title: Drone Zone
frontmatter.backgroundAlt: A screenshot of Drone Zone's homepage

frontmatter.title: Restaurant reviews
frontmatter.backgroundAlt: A screenshot of Restaurant Reviews' homepage
frontmatter.description: A Progressive Web App I build during Udacity's Mobile Web Specialist Nanodegree Program. It allows starring, rating and reviewing different restaurants in a certain area.

frontmatter.title: Jokr
frontmatter.description: A progressive Web App I built after I had finished Udacity's Mobile Web Specialist scholarship to test my knowledge of PWAs and performance on the web.
